+tk|SD$XjE]ndtQYI#VG: Level one is very difficult so you can skip it.

VALUE: You have been accepted to the PSD. The PSD is the Phantom Strike Division. Your goal is to do the hardest missions that other divisions cant do.
Level one is very difficult so you can skip it.

A mysterious super villain, we only  know by Atomic, started a countdown to launch a nuclear missile at Washington DC to kill the  president. The code must have  something to do with him so we  gave you his presional record. He  likes to use Caesar Cipher Code Wheels with only #s on it.

A villain only Known by Tracer is getting on a plane to Mexico with  stolen weapons, and once he is on the plane we cant stop him. You will  have to shoot him from the top of a nearby hill. He has brown hair, blue eyes, and white skin.

Noxious, a world known kidnapper, has kidnapped a senator of the UK. You have to kill his guards, he left to watch the senator while he when to get food, before the S.W.A.T team lands on the roof to rescue the senator.

A criminal named Reaper has activated a bomb in D.C. for 3 hours when the president will arrive there for dinner. Reaper has put up moving turrets to kill anyone trying to deactivate it. You have to get past the turrets and deactivate the bomb.

A world known terrorist named Scourge is at the 2024 olympics gymnastics competition. Once the announcer gets on the stage he will blow up the whole arena with bombs he placed earlier. He has red hair, brown eyes, and a grey shirt.

While you were doing a mission in russia the government found and put you in jail for spying on them. A member of our team located you and sent you a letter with the words printed using gunpowder. Once you break out get in the blue van. Use [Space] to pick up and use, [D] to drop

OPERAND2: Are you sure you want to restart?
The game will turn of automaticly turn it back on.

VALUE: Your mission is to infiltrate a terrorist organization and learn the code to their bank account so we can hack in and close it down. When you get the passcode go back to the blue box and put in the code.

Your goal is to neutralize a terrorist named Apex. You will have to hide in a bush and move to get to him, attack(space or hit attack button) him and we will handle the rest, you can only attack once. If the guards see you moving they will shoot.
Are you sure you want to restart?
The game will turn of automaticly turn it back on.
